member.name: WS_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION_CALLBACK_CONTEXT
member.summary: The WS_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION_CALLBACK_CONTEXT structure contains the callback function and state for validating the certificate for an HTTP connection.

member.name: WS_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION_CALLBACK_CONTEXT.callback
member.summary: A WS_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION_CALLBACK callback that is an application specific callback for validating HTTP certificates.

member.name: WS_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION_CALLBACK_CONTEXT.state
member.summary: Application specific state that is made available to the callback when invoked.
